roleset.name: exact and reproducible
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: arg0, EXT
example.text: In order to force China to foot the bill , the IMF repeatedly overturn its own previous estimates of China 's economic growth , adjusted from 9.0 percent down to 8.25 percent -LRB- but still being able *PRO* to be precise to two hundredths , it 's really amazing -RRB- .

example.name: both args
example.text: The Buddha was precise in his description of Right Speech
example.arg: in his description of Right Speech

example.name: both args
example.text: An MRI in our case was precise in localizing the site and extent of fracture, which was reiterated by our surgical findings.
example.arg: in localizing the site and extent of fracture
which was reiterated by our surgical findings
